channel.title: Flying on Scott O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in Flying on Scott O'Brien

item.title: Readme
item.description: This directory contains my flying related flightlog. The scripts here will setup pages for all the sites I’ve flown at, and flight statistics for them. To (re)-generate the launches files 1 scott@ScottoDesktop:~/website$ unzip -p content/flying/launches/paraglidingspots_2022_10_22.kmz doc.kml | ~/.local/bin/xq | sed 's/kml\://' | jq '[.. | .Placemark? // empty] | flatten | map((.Point | .coordinates | split(",")?) as $c | {name, longitude: ($c[0] | tonumber), latitude: ($c[1] | tonumber) })' > .
